ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Is there any documentation about what happens to the queue when a toe thread is killed? I have been waiting for 21 threads to finish for 2 days now and

Hello,
Is there any documentation about what happens to the queue when a to=
e thread is killed? I have been waiting for 21 threads to finish for 2 days=
 now and am thinking of just killing them off. Is the queue at all affected=
 if threads are killed half-way through? Mainly, I care if the thread hold =
large amounts of information about the current crawl state and thus would h=
eavily affect the crawl integrity.
Niels
